name: The Tom and Jerry Show
overview: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in a fresh take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility of the original, this series shines a brightly colored, high-definition lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

episodes.name: Spike Gets Skooled
episodes.overview: Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school, and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns, Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

episodes.name: Cat's Ruffled Fur-niture
episodes.overview: Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters, but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive, he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

episodes.name: Sleep Disorder
episodes.overview: Rick buys Ginger a brand new mattress with a lot of high tech features. Tom is under strict orders to never sleep on it, but Butch convinces him to try it out. Jerry uses the controls against them and soon that mattress is out of control and destroys the entire house.

episodes.name: Tom's In-Tents Adventure
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry get a taste of the great outdoors on their camping trip to Yosemite. Tom tries hard to relax, but nature - and all its inhabitants, including bears - get in his way.

episodes.name: Birthday Bashed
episodes.overview: When Tom and Jerry accidentally ruin Spike's birthday party for Tyke, he forces them to take over. They must entertain and take care of the puppy birthday bash, but no matter what they do, nothing seems to ever work out right.

episodes.name: Feline Fatale
episodes.overview: When Toodles hires Tom and Jerry to investigate and protect her against a threat to her Tuna can inheritance. They go investigate, and a mysterious figure keeps trying to hurt them. They discover Butch was also hired by Toodles to protect the tuna. Spike was guarding the cans, but was distracted by the fighting and leaves the cans unprotected. They discover Toodles wasn't being completely honest with her story.

episodes.name: Cat Nippy
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland, until they realize they can't get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

episodes.name: Ghosts of a Chance
episodes.overview: Jerry causes Tom to lose 8 out of his 9 lives. Tom uses magic to bring them back, and instead is stuck with 8 annoying ghost versions of himself. They try to catch Jerry, who is still too clever for them. Tom decides to work with Jerry and they come up with a magic spell to send these ghosts back where they came.

episodes.name: Holed-Up
episodes.overview: When Jerry ventures out of his hole for a late night snack, Tom has a trap set for him. Unfortunately for Tom, he falls into his own trap and gets his head stuck through the wall.

episodes.name: One of a Kind
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry are hired by Polly the Dog to get back her collar from mean Barkley at the park. Later, Barkley reforms when he meets Polly and falls in love with her.

episodes.name: Belly Achin'
episodes.overview: Little Quacker enlists Jerry's help to fix his favorite birdbath that has cracked, but the two get sidetracked by the scent of Tom's delicious Chinese takeout.

episodes.name: Dog Daze
episodes.overview: When Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way, Spike must do everything he can to keep from losing his temper in front of Tyke.

episodes.name: Birds of a Feather
episodes.overview: Ginger is in charge of taking care of her mother's bird and Tom tries his hardest to keep from eating the bird.

episodes.name: Vampire Mouse
episodes.overview: Jerry pretends to be a vampire to scare Tom. Now it's up to Tom - with the help of his friend Newt - to defeat the vampire mouse!

episodes.name: Entering and Breaking
episodes.overview: When Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars, Spike steps up and trains Tom and Jerry to be his helpers.

episodes.name: Franken Kitty
episodes.overview: Tom is mistaken for Dr. Bigby's cat Wilson. Now Tom must convince Dr. Bigby he has the wrong cat! Meanwhile, Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real, very vicious Wilson.

episodes.name: Haunted Mouse
episodes.overview: Tuffy hires detectives Tom and Jerry to investigate the ghost hauntings in his house.

episodes.name: Tom-Foolery
episodes.overview: Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat. But each finds the others life to be quite difficult.

episodes.name: Here's Looking A-Choo Kid
episodes.overview: When it seems like Spike has developed an allergic reaction to Tom, Rick buys Ginger a hypoallergetic cat named Glory. Could Glory be too good to be true?

episodes.name: Superfied
episodes.overview: Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. Jerry and Napoleon sneak some cookies and have fun terrorizing Tom… until the tables are turned.

episodes.name: What a Pain!
episodes.overview: After a particularly destructive chase, Tom and Spike have to go to the vet and Ginger hires an exterminator to take care of Jerry and Tuffy once and for all.

episodes.name: Hop to It
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches' spell before sundown, but when Tom sees Princess Toodles, he quickly forgets the mission.

episodes.name: For the Love of Ruggles
episodes.overview: Tom kicks Spike's beloved chew toy Ruggles over the fence and has to get it back when he sees how heartbroken Spike becomes.

episodes.name: Sleuth or Consequences
episodes.overview: Butch and a squirrel detective steal all of Tom and Jerry's customers by using high-tech devices to solve crimes. Tom and Jerry challenges them to a case-solving competition.

episodes.name: Dinner Is Swerved
episodes.overview: When Rick and Ginger leave Tom home alone, Tom and Jerry decide to invite their lady friends over for a romantic dinner. But things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: Bottled Up Emotions
episodes.overview: Jerry gets affected by one of Dr. Bigby's experiments.

episodes.name: Turn About
episodes.overview: Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from a date with Toodles. Tom tries to escape, but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think it's a monster downstairs.

episodes.name: The Plight Before Christmas
episodes.overview: Tom accidentally puts a spell on Santa and, as a result of Santa's new state, Tom and Jerry volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs.

episodes.name: Tuffy Love
episodes.overview: Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready to go to a family reunion, but unfortunately, Tuffy gets left behind. Tom thinks Tuffy is easy pickings, but he's in for a surprise.

episodes.name: Poof!
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are hired by a bad magician to find out where his pigeon disappeared to during a magic trick gone awry.

episodes.name: Top Cat
episodes.overview: When Tom and Butch compete to be top cat in the United Mouse Catchers, they must prove their worth by finally catching Jerry.

episodes.name: Mummy Dearest
episodes.overview: Hildie and Beatie commemorate the passing of their mother and Tom tries to help out by bringing her back from the grave.

episodes.name: Domestic Kingdom
episodes.overview: Tom stars in a documentary that mis-characterizes his daily activities. All of his daily activities, from chasing Jerry to "romancing" Toodles are recorded.

episodes.name: Molecular Break Up
episodes.overview: Dr. Bigby invents a transporting machine that accidentally transports Jerry and Tom to Paris where they meet Gigi and Cozette.

episodes.name: Just Plane Nuts
episodes.overview: Rick and Ginger go on a vacation and bring Tom and Spike aboard the plane. Stowaways Jerry and Tuffy are also on board, and soon the pets are chasing each other on the plane!

episodes.name: Pets Not Welcome
episodes.overview: When Rick and Ginger sneak Tom and Spike into a hotel where pets are not allowed, they make the pets promise not to leave the hotel room. Will the pets behave?

episodes.name: Cruisin' for a Bruisin
episodes.overview: On a cruise ship with Rick and Ginger, Jerry and Tuffy leave Spike and Tom in the room to go explore, but a vicious ship cat named Meathead will stop at nothing to terrorize them.

episodes.name: Road Trippin'
episodes.overview: Rick and Ginger take Tom and Spike on a road trip where Spike is terrorized by a dog traveling in a trailer. Jerry and Tuffy get caught in Rick and Ginger's suitcase.

episodes.name: Magic Mirror
episodes.overview: Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune-telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesn't like, he tries everything to avoid it - but this seems to make things worse.

episodes.name: Bone Dry
episodes.overview: Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones and the detectives investigate a community garden.

episodes.name: My Bot-y Guard
episodes.overview: Dr. Bigby upgrades Bot to a Bot-y Guard. When Tom sets off Bot's defensive systems, things get out of control and Jerry and Napoleon must disarm Bot without hurting him.

episodes.name: Little Quacker and Mister Fuzzy Hide
episodes.overview: When the witches' herb garden is destroyed, Tom sets a trap to capture the pest responsible. Quackers helps him but is unknowingly the pest Tom seeks to capture.

episodes.name: Pipeline
episodes.overview: When Tom and Jerry lose Ginger's wedding ring down the drain, they send Jerry through the pipes to retrieve it, but it leads down the drain, to the sewers and out to the beach!

episodes.name: No Brain, No Gain
episodes.overview: Dr. Bigby creates a helmet that turns Tom into a genius. Napoleon, Jerry and Hamster work together to take down the newly smart Tom who is now building a mouse-destroying weapon.

episodes.name: Cat Napped
episodes.overview: Tom witnesses what seems like the kidnapping of Misty, the cute cat across the street. He enlists the help of her neighbor to track down her whereabouts.

episodes.name: Black Cat
episodes.overview: Fed up with Tom, Hildie and Beatie threaten to get a "real" witch's cat: a black cat. In desperation, Tom takes a magic potion that makes him turn black but only temporarily.

episodes.name: Hunger Strikes
episodes.overview: Believing they are going to run out of food during a snowstorm, the pets start hoarding food. Things get out of control when they start stealing food and double-crossing one other.

episodes.name: Gravi-Tom
episodes.overview: Jerry and Napoleon play around with Bigby's brand-new anti- gravity machine... until Tom breaks into the lab and a chase begins.

episodes.name: Ghost Party
episodes.overview: When the witches leave on vacation, Tom's dreams of rest and relaxation are ruined when their ghost nephew Grayson comes over and throws a giant ghost party.

episodes.name: Cat-Astrophe
episodes.overview: Tom accidentally gives himself electrical superpowers, and now Jerry must fend off Tom while fighting off an asteroid heading right toward Bigby's lab.

episodes.name: Curse Case Scenario
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dutch to find a cursed ruby that causes him to have bad luck when it is missing.

episodes.name: Say Cheese
episodes.overview: Tom eats some canned cheese that has gone bad and hallucinates. Tom must become a better cat to end the nightmare.

episodes.name: Dental Case
episodes.overview: Spike needs Tom and Jerry's help to pull his tooth so he can avoid the vet.

episodes.name: Picture Imperfect
episodes.overview: Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready for Picture Day while Tom and Spike are getting clean for it.

episodes.name: One-Way Cricket
episodes.overview: After Tom accidentally lets a cricket into the house, he must get rid of it in order to avoid sleeping outside with Spike.

episodes.name: Slinging in the Rain
episodes.overview: Tom is left outside when a rainstorm approaches. When he gets indoors and the rain is gone, Jerry and Tuffy torments him, Spike and Tyke by using water on them.

episodes.name: Squeaky Clean
episodes.overview: Rick mail-orders a cat-hair zapping robot which causes problems around Tom and Jerry.

episodes.name: Tough Luck Duck
episodes.overview: Little Quacker thinks he's being bad luck around Tom, Jerry and Spike after walking under a ladder.

episodes.name: The Paper Airplane Chase
episodes.overview: When Tom is left in charge to watch Ginger's cake batter when she goes out to the store, Jerry and Tuffy use paper airplanes to get to the cake batter.

episodes.name: Round Tripped
episodes.overview: Tom is excited to go away with Rick and Ginger for a weekend getaway to an island paradise, but when he keeps getting hurt pursuing Jerry, Rick and Ginger considers keeping Tom at the pet oasis if he keeps getting hurt.

episodes.name: Smitten with the Kitten
episodes.overview: A cute kitten named Button stays over at the house until she has a new home. Everybody likes Button except for Tom.

episodes.name: Cheesy Ball Run
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry and Butch watch a Smack-n-Cheese Cheesy Cheese Puffs commercial and when they hear, "Supplies are running out!" the rivalry between the trio reaches new heights as they compete to get what they image to be the very last bag of Smack-n-Cheese Cheesy Cheese Puffs.

episodes.name: Say Uncle
episodes.overview: Jerry's Uncle Harry is coming for a visit. Tuffy's excited to meet the Great Uncle he has heard so much about. Harry craves a respite from his life as a nomad on the party cruise ship circuit, but it doesn't take him long to realize that life on the high seas has its advantages (specifically not being holed-up with Tom).

episodes.name: Here Comes the Bribe
episodes.overview: When Toodles' tells her parents that she is married with kids, she asks Tom to be her "husband".

episodes.name: Slap Happy Birthday
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry try to give Spike a birthday to remember.

episodes.name: Tuffy's Big Adventure
episodes.overview: Tuffy and Tyke head out on a big adventure.

episodes.name: Dragon Down the Holidays
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry befriend a baby dragon.

episodes.name: Big Top Tom
episodes.overview: Jerry enjoys the perks of circus life. Meanwhile, Tom, who thinks Jerry has been swallowed by a bear, tries to rescue him.

episodes.name: Reward If lost
episodes.overview: Jerry spreads signs saying to return Tom to a house that is not his, but a very stout black dog.

episodes.name: Build-a-Beast
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry face Bog, the cottage beast.

episodes.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry and Spike go to war with a mockingbird.

episodes.name: From Nuts to Soup
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry face a flying squirrel.

episodes.name: No Fly Zone
episodes.overview: Jerry battles a pesky fly over a cheese wedge.

episodes.name: X Marks the Thumpin'
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry get a hold of a treasure map.

episodes.name: Charity Case
episodes.overview: Jerry donates Tom’s blanket to 'Badwill.'

episodes.name: Duck, Duck, Loose
episodes.overview: Jerry discovers that Little Quacker is a sleepwalker.

episodes.name: Dandy Do-Gooders
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry have their own little scouting competition.

episodes.name: Shadow Boxin'
episodes.overview: Tom becomes separated from his own shadow.

episodes.name: Baby Blues
episodes.overview: Spike is tasked with taking care of a baby.

episodes.name: Life's a Beach
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry must work together to survive on a beach day.

episodes.name: Meanie Genie
episodes.overview: Jerry is granted three wishes by a genie.

episodes.name: Flea Bitten
episodes.overview: Butch accidentally brings an infestation of fleas into the house.

episodes.name: I Quit
episodes.overview: Jerry gives up living with Tom and decides to live in the house of a friendlier cat.

episodes.name: The Art of the Deal
episodes.overview: Spike uses the detectives Tom and Jerry to win several card game dog matches.

episodes.name: Hiccup and Away
episodes.overview: Tom sobers and the witches force him into the dark forest to scare himself and free himself from sobbing. But what he did not know was that the witches asked for Jerry's help to follow him and use their magic wand to create several scares for Tom along the way.

episodes.name: Tom-Fu
episodes.overview: Tom hurts his head when he takes a hit from the television, making him look like a karate master and assaulting Spike, Jerry and Tuffy all over the house.

episodes.name: You Can't Handle the Tooth
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry use a magic tooth that ends up making them destroy the house of the witches.

episodes.name: Pain for Sale
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry help Spike retrieve Tyke's first lost leash.

episodes.name: Downton Tabby
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry create much confusion in a fancy restaurant.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Tom tries to prove that he can make a better garden than Jerry's.

episodes.name: Toodle Boom!
episodes.overview: Toodles gets excited when she tries to chase Jerry and Tuffy around the house and Tom tries to distract her at any cost.

episodes.name: Bringing Down
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry and Spike try to drive out a sour nanny from their house.

episodes.name: Return to Sender
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry try to discover the secret admirer of the witch Beatie.

episodes.name: Jerry Rigged
episodes.overview: A red cat helps Tom invent plans so he can capture Jerry.

episodes.name: The Art of War
episodes.overview: Tom tries to protect Rick's Ginger birthday frame, while Jerry only makes things difficult for him.

episodes.name: Pillow Case
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry help a little dog named Stardust find her missing cushion.

episodes.name: Home Insecurity
episodes.overview: Rick installs a home automation system in the house controls. But, Tom and Jerry end up overusing the technology of the main system commands, which causes several disasters around the house.

episodes.name: The Tail of Two Kitties
episodes.overview: Butch pretends his tail is broken, just to settle in Tom and Jerry's house.

episodes.name: Vanishing Creamed
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry use too much witches' disappearance potion causing major accidental problems.

episodes.name: Unhappily Harried After
episodes.overview: Tom asks for Toodles' hand in marriage. After this, Toodles orders that Tom and Jerry do all the heavy work to take care of the small sons of her.

episodes.name: Splinter of Discontent
episodes.overview: Tom tries to pull a thorn out of Tyke's leg without Spike finding out, but for that, he must rely on Jerry and Tuffy.

episodes.name: Forget Me Not
episodes.overview: Tom tries to remember all the events that occurred while he solved a case in his detective work.

episodes.name: In the Beginning
episodes.overview: One back in time showing how Tom and Jerry met.

episodes.name: Uncle Pecos Rides Again
episodes.overview: Uncle Pecos pays a visit to Jerry's house and uses Tom as his rodeo horse.

episodes.name: Out with the Old
episodes.overview: When Jerry overhears Rick and Ginger wanting to get rid of a “useless cat”, he tries to keep Tom working as fully as possible.

episodes.name: Tic-tyke-d'oh
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry and Spike try to help Tyke get along in games and games.

episodes.name: Tom and Jerry-Geddon
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry make a battlefield indoors.

episodes.name: No Strings Attached
episodes.overview: Tom uses the witch's magic wand to give life to a puppet who ends up comparing Jerry to a baby.

episodes.name: Move It or Loose It
episodes.overview: Spike gets fat by eating too much grilled meat, so Tom and Jerry try to hide all of it so he can't eat any more.

episodes.name: Wing Nuts
episodes.overview: Little Quacker asks the help of the detectives Tom and Jerry to help him find his girlfriend, Fifi, who waits for him to take him on a trip to the south.

episodes.name: Cat Dance Fever
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry help Toodles win a dance contest.

episodes.name: Hunger Games
episodes.overview: Tom tries to eat the Little Quacker and Jerry does everything to ensure his protection.

episodes.name: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Tom is losing a lot of his hair and asks Jerry and Spike for help to get them back.

episodes.name: Missing in Traction
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry investigate the case of a mysterious maniacal dog that is astounding every cat in town.

episodes.name: Funnel Face
episodes.overview: Tom becomes a joke when he's forced to use a cone for a week.

episodes.name: Dirty Rat
episodes.overview: A street mouse takes advantage of Tom and Jerry's stewardship to get food.

episodes.name: Cat-titude Adjustment
episodes.overview: The witches cast a spell on Tom's attitude so he could get a better understanding of Jerry.

episodes.name: Pinch Hitter
episodes.overview: Tom enters a feline institute and tries to stop his traps from catching Meathead inside his house.

episodes.name: Fight in the Museum
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry fight in a museum of national antiques.

episodes.name: Kitten Grifters
episodes.overview: Sleep-Deprived Tom and Jerry try to stop a thief kitten who has been stealing all things from the hotel's residents.

episodes.name: School of Hard Knocks
episodes.overview: Winston runs a small school and Tom and Jerry help him with the most difficult tasks.

episodes.name: Cat-a-Tonic Mouse
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry, and Spike get sick and Uncle Pecos comes to rest them.

episodes.name: Brain Food
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry help a paranoid dog investigate aliens from another planet who show up at the home of their cat friends.

episodes.name: Wish Bone
episodes.overview: When Butch offers his wish bone to Tom, he's willing to make his requests a reality.

episodes.name: Going Going Gone Viral
episodes.overview: Tom is ridiculed by everyone when his hilarious video is posted on the internet.

episodes.name: The Tortoise Don't Play Fair
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry try to stop a cheeky jabuti who will participate in a race with his rival, a rabbit.

episodes.name: Fish Out of Water
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry face the witches' pet piranha.

episodes.name: Cat Match Fever
episodes.overview: Jerry and Tuffy help Winston prepare the perfect match for Toodles, but Tom and Butch are not at all pleased with this affair.

episodes.name: Cold Snap
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry use the magic of the witches to get rid of the heat.

episodes.name: Novel Idea
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry look for customers who need their help. In the end, it all goes well with a big surprise party especially for the detectives.

episodes.name: Someone's In the Kitchen With Mynah
episodes.overview: Ginger gets a Mynah bird that causes trouble when he imitates everyone in the household.

episodes.name: When you Leash Expect It
episodes.overview: Spike and an apathetic Tom are taken for a walk by their owners, as Jerry and Nibbles have the house to themselves.

episodes.name: Don't Cut the Cheese
episodes.overview: Tom is tasked with keeping the Montezuma's Lament Stilton Cheese safe from harm, including Jerry.

episodes.name: Calamari Jerry
episodes.overview: Jerry bonds with a baby octopus.

episodes.name: Cattyshack
episodes.overview: Tom must set the golf course up so the lady of the house could play Croquet, but he and Jerry end up destroying the golf course in the process.

episodes.name: Drone Sweet Drone
episodes.overview: Rick gets a new Delivery drone and Tom and Jerry end up going on a joyride on it.

episodes.name: Home Away From Home
episodes.overview: Tom finds himself in another neighborhood, after sleeping inside a rolled-up carpet.

episodes.name: From Riches to Rags
episodes.overview: Jerry has a dream that Tom is his servant and orders him to do whatever he wants.

episodes.name: Chew Toy
episodes.overview: Tom ends up in a box for a garage sale and is taken to a house where he becomes a dog's new chew toy.

episodes.name: Live and Let Diet
episodes.overview: Tom is tasked with making Alfred, the house dog fit and ready for a dog show, but Jerry won't make it easy!

episodes.name: Auntie Social
episodes.overview: Tom spends a few days at Rick's Aunt's house.

episodes.name: Snootful
episodes.overview: Tom is tasked with keeping Jerry from bothering a snooty cat, belonging to the Duchess' friend, but the fancy cat has her intentions on capturing Jerry.

episodes.name: Lame Duck
episodes.overview: When Rick and Ginger install a new birdbath, Little Quacker uses it and is adored by Ginger. Tom and Spike plot to get rid of him.

episodes.name: It's All Relative
episodes.overview: Jerry's annoying British cousins pay him a visit and Tom and Jerry plan to get rid of them.

episodes.name: Vegged Out
episodes.overview: Tom has a fear of cucumbers.

episodes.name: Frown and Country
episodes.overview: Jerry is suffering the springtime blues, but at Muscles' suggestion, Jerry just might find romance.

episodes.name: Lost Marbles
episodes.overview: Det. Tom and Jerry helps Meathead find his marbles for a tournament.

episodes.name: Vocal Yokal
episodes.overview: Little Quacker gets a new talent: singing opera and when he sings in Jerry's mouse hole, Rick and Ginger assumes Jerry is the one singing.

episodes.name: Hamster Hoopla
episodes.overview: When Ginger takes in a hamster left on the doorstep, it escapes and Tom has Jerry posing as the hamster, but soon they discover more hamsters are in the cage multiplying.

episodes.name: Tuff Shooting
episodes.overview: On a day of Clay pigeon shooting, Tom tries to remove Tuffy and Jerry.

episodes.name: Anger Mismanagement
episodes.overview: Jerry's cousin Muscles visits and teaches Tom and Spike anger management from a book he wrote.

episodes.name: Vampire State
episodes.overview: Tom becomes a vampire.

episodes.name: It Ain't Over Until the Cat Lady Sings
episodes.overview: In this musical episode, Det. Tom and Jerry are on a mystery case about the disappearance of musical diva Kitty Caterwaul.

episodes.name: Eggstra Credit
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry attempt to get eggs from chickens next door.

episodes.name: Costume Party Smarty
episodes.overview: When Rick and Ginger throw a Halloween costume party, Tom, Jerry, Spike and Tuffy wants the food from the party.

episodes.name: Battle of the Butlers
episodes.overview: Tom reads and learns from a book written by Jerry to be in The "Battle of the Butlers" competition.

episodes.name: Kid Stuff
episodes.overview: Tom is tasked with clearing the tall grass off the mansion grounds, but when a gluttonous baby goat finds his way into the grounds, Tom gets help from the baby goat.

episodes.name: Stolen Heart
episodes.overview: A pastry owner hires Det. Tom and Jerry to locate a heart-shaped cake containing a diamond ring.

episodes.name: The Last Laugh
episodes.overview: Red Herring hires Det. Tom and Jerry to find out who is laughing driving the dog crazy.

episodes.name: The Invisible Cat
episodes.overview: Tom is chased by a Transparent Cat inside a haunted house.

episodes.name: Eagle Eye Jerry
episodes.overview: During Ginger and Rick's camping hike, Jerry befriends and watches over three Eaglets.

episodes.name: Catching Some Zs
episodes.overview: Tom is being chased by feline zombies, so He asks Jerry Van Mousing for help.

episodes.name: Frenemies
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry band together to get Butch and his ex-girlfriend back together, so that Butch won't go back to Toodles.

episodes.name: You Are What You Eat
episodes.overview: Rick and Ginger exchange Tom and Spike's food as they eat different kinds of dog and cat food they turn into those animals who eat that type of food.

episodes.name: Not My Tyke
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are ordered by Spike to take care of Tyke while he is gone for a drive. Things get bad when Tyke hides in a bundle of clothes.

episodes.name: Everyone Into the Pool
episodes.overview: Tom, Butch and Meathead are invited by Toodles to her pool but as Toodles says that she will go on a date with whoever wins a game of billiards, Jerry calls in his seal friend from the short: "Little Runaway."

episodes.name: A Head for Science
episodes.overview: A crazed scientist assigns Tom to keep Jerry von Mousing from sabotaging his laboratory, but when a monster of Frankenstein proportions comes into the fray.

episodes.name: Cat Cop
episodes.overview: Tom messes with Jerry using a Rat Repellent Spray.

episodes.name: Dis-Repair Man
episodes.overview: Tom tries to fix the house to avoid sleeping outside with Spike.

episodes.name: Double Dog Trouble
episodes.overview: Spike hires Tom and Jerry to resolve an identity crisis.

episodes.name: Hockey Jockeys
episodes.overview: When Ginger gets a new air hockey table for Rick on his birthday, Tom, Jerry, Tuffy and Butch uses and plays with it.

episodes.name: Hyde and Shriek
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry and Tuffy meets a Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde cat.

episodes.name: Perfume Party
episodes.overview: Toodles loves the new perfume Butch got her. Tom goes and makes his own perfume to win her over.

episodes.name: The Royal Treatment
episodes.overview: When the chief butler is coming over for an inspection, Jerry poses as him to get his hands on the food, but Tom sees through his disguise.

episodes.name: Lightning Bug Blues
episodes.overview: Jerry befriends a Lightning Bug. The Lightning Bug helps Jerry get even with Tom for leaving the T.V. light on.

episodes.name: The Beast from the Bayu
episodes.overview: Toxic waste turns Tom into a Bayou beast.

episodes.name: All Cat Jazz
episodes.overview: A alley rat manages Tom, Jerry and Spike to perform in a Jazz trio so he wants food.

episodes.name: Alley Oops!
episodes.overview: Butch wants Tom, Jerry and Spike get him back in the alley when a little tough cat moves in the alley and puts him out.

episodes.name: Magic Hat Cat
episodes.overview: When a birthday Magician leaves his hat over at Rick and Ginger's, Tom, Jerry, Spike and Butch discover it is no ordinary hat.

episodes.name: Wrap Star
episodes.overview: Tom goes into a castle where he encounters a Mummy cat.

episodes.name: Charm School Dropouts
episodes.overview: After an unsuccessful attempt by Butch and Tom to charm Toodles, she sends them to a Charm School.

episodes.name: Driven Crazy
episodes.overview: When Tom is ordered to wash the car for the Duke and Duchess, he takes it for a spin with Jerry and Tuffy along for the ride.

episodes.name: Star Forlorn
episodes.overview: Tom is chosen to be a spokescat for Cat Snacks.

episodes.name: Bird Flue
episodes.overview: Tom is ordered to sweep the chimney and puts up with two birds and Jerry.

episodes.name: Tom's Tangled Web
episodes.overview: A bite from a spider transforms Tom into a spider.

episodes.name: Saddle Soreheads
episodes.overview: When a show champion horse goes missing, Tom is on the lookout for it as Jerry tries to hide the horse.

episodes.name: Rosemary's Gravy
episodes.overview: Ginger's mother, Rosemary comes to care for an injured Rick. When she throws away the unhealthy food, Rick, Tom, Jerry and Spike look for unhealthy food since they can't stand her cooking style.

episodes.name: Eggs on a Train
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry are hired by a dog to escort his precious egg, but Butch and Meathead try to steal it.

episodes.name: Truffle Trouble
episodes.overview: Tom is assigned to bring Truffles for a pig down at a farm.

episodes.name: Bars and Stripes
episodes.overview: Tom is wrongfully accused of robbing a jewelry store and he ends up at the Animal Shelter. Jerry helps out by clearing his name.

episodes.name: Cuckoo Clock
episodes.overview: Ginger warns Tom not to break her family heirloom cuckoo clock, and he does it by accident. He attempts to fix it before Ginger comes back from a game of golf.

episodes.name: Plant Food
episodes.overview: Tom goes to a castle that has a greenhouse that has man-eating plants.

episodes.name: Whack a Gopher
episodes.overview: Tom must get rid of the gopher that's been eating the garden food.

episodes.name: Hula Whoops
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry travel with Toodles to Hawaii for a case.

episodes.name: A Game of Bones
episodes.overview: When Spike thinks a black bone that Tom has found is cursed, Spike becomes nice to Tom.

episodes.name: Bull Fight
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry try to stop a 40 year old turtle from fighting against a bull in the boxing ring.

episodes.name: No Contest
episodes.overview: When Spike enters Tyke in the Puppy Olympics, he gets Tom to help train Tyke.

episodes.name: Calorie Count
episodes.overview: Jerry's uncle Count DeCalorie visits and shows that he's not overweight anymore, but all the delicious food he eats puts the weight back on him.

episodes.name: Fortune Hunters
episodes.overview: Detectives Tom and Jerry are on the case to bring back a smelly dog's fortune.

episodes.name: Game Changer
episodes.overview: Tom walks into a castle to discover a checkerboard game has come to life.

episodes.name: Kiss and Makeup
episodes.overview: New neighbor Misty Makeup Mavin is selling beauty makeup and wants a kiss from Tom. Jerry and Tuffy attempt to stop the kiss from happening.

episodes.name: Suitable for Framing
episodes.overview: Life really does imitate art for Tom when a ghost artist paints a nice picture of him and the picture seems to change whenever Tom has a different thing happen to him.

episodes.name: Springtime for Spike
episodes.overview: Spike falls in love with a french poodle named Sabrina who takes more of a liking to Tom than him.

episodes.name: Knighty Knight Knight
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry and Tuffy discover that a knight suit has 3 kittens inside of it.

episodes.name: Phan-Tom of the Oompah
episodes.overview: It's up to Jerry Von Mousing to stop Tom as "The Phantom Of The Oompah."

episodes.name: Ballad of the Catnip Kid
episodes.overview: Tom dreams that he is The Catnip Kid up against Sheriff Jerry.

episodes.name: Mirror Image
episodes.overview: When the mirrors break in the castle, Tom, Jerry and Tuffy are cursed with bad luck when they stumble upon a mirror that has mischievous versions of Tom in it.

episodes.name: Faux Hunt
episodes.overview: Tom gets confused for a fox by a local-fox-hunting party.

episodes.name: Gym Rat
episodes.overview: Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be oudone, Tom starts lifting weights as well, which sets up an epic battle royale between the cat and mouse.

episodes.name: Scrunch Time
episodes.overview: Tom's obsession with the sound his new crinkle ball drives the rest of the household crazy, forcing them to take drastic measures to rid the house of the annoying toy.

episodes.name: Mice From Mars
episodes.overview: Mice visitors from Mars force Tom to change the way he treats Jerry.

episodes.name: The Maltese Pigeon
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are hired to find a missing priceless Maltese Pigeon.

episodes.name: Loch Ness Mess
episodes.overview: Tom enlists the help of the lake monster to terrorize the mouse village forcing Jerry Van Mouseling to intervene and save the day.

episodes.name: Werewolf of Catsylvania
episodes.overview: A werewolf terrorizes Tom and the inhabitants of the Catsylvania village.

episodes.name: The Great Catsby
episodes.overview: Tom must compete with his American cousin for the right to remain a Butler at Postlewaite manor.

episodes.name: A Class Of Their Own
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are forced to go back to Detective School in order to renew their detective licenses.

episodes.name: Yeti, Set, Go
episodes.overview: When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town, Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast.

episodes.name: Ghoul's Gold
episodes.overview: Tom serves an evil pirate determined to steal treasure belonging to the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling foils his plans.

episodes.name: What About Blob?
episodes.overview: Tom turns into a Blob monster and proceeds to eat everything in sight, including the village mice! Jerry Van Mouseling to the rescue!

episodes.name: Mouse Party
episodes.overview: Rick and Ginger leave town with instructions for Tom to keep the house in order, but Jerry's got other ideas.

episodes.name: Maust
episodes.overview: Tom is tricked into helping an evil magician capture all of the mice in the village, but Jerry Van Mouseling foils the magician's plans.

episodes.name: Tom Prix
episodes.overview: Tom, forced into driving a race car created by evil Dr. Otto, terrorizes the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling comes to their rescue.

episodes.name: Hip Replacement
episodes.overview: The neighbor's cat turns out to be a hipster who's laid back attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

episodes.name: Cat-A-Combs
episodes.overview: Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs.

episodes.name: Cat-astrophic Failure
episodes.overview: Spike leaves Tom in charge of his boy Tyke only to discover upon his return that Tyke now behaves more like a cat than a dog.

episodes.name: Un-Welcome Home
episodes.overview: After taking the heat again from Ginger for Jerry's shenanigans, fed up Tom decides to pack his bags and go home to his birth family. But can you ever really go home again?

episodes.name: Downton Crabby
episodes.overview: Jerry battles Tom to save a crab from becoming the Duke and Duchess' main course.

episodes.name: Mega-Tom
episodes.overview: Frankenstein turns Tom into a colossus and Tom ends up terrorizing the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling saves the day.

episodes.name: Jabberwock
episodes.overview: Tom finds himself trapped inside a Catsylvania bedtime story and fleeing from a furious Jabberwock.

episodes.name: A Clown Without Pity
episodes.overview: An evil ringmaster recruits Tom to help him snare the Catsylvania mice.

episodes.name: Duck Sitting
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry must keep Lil' Quacker safe from Butch and Meathead so that he can testify to a crime in court.

episodes.name: Three Heads Are Better Than One
episodes.overview: Tom, Jerry Van Mouseling and the village mice must deal with a howling three head dog that Tom has accidentally awakened.

episodes.name: Dam Busters
episodes.overview: Tom must cut fire word for the Manor fireplaces while Jerry harasses him.

episodes.name: The Devil You Know
episodes.overview: A guilty conscience causes Butch to change his ways. But Tom, Jerry, Spike and Tuffy quickly decide they like the old Butch better.

episodes.name: Counting Sheep
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dixie Wolf to find all the sheep that have gone missing.

episodes.name: The Old Gray Hair
episodes.overview: After discovering a gray hair, Spikes decides he's too old to be the alpha of the house which sends Tom into full bully mode. Jerry will have to act fast to convince Spike he's still the alpha dog.

episodes.name: Chutes and Tatters
episodes.overview: Tom's assigned laundry duty at the estate and Jerry's determined to soil the job.

episodes.name: (Not) Your Father's Mouse-Stache
episodes.overview: It's the battle of the moustaches when Tom accidentally drinks a hair tonic potion left behind by Jerry and Butch realizes he needs to acquire some facial hair of his own if he is to compete for Toodles and Dollface's attentions.

episodes.name: Balloonatics
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry fight each other with the balloons that Rick has placed all over the house to surprise Ginger on their anniversary.

episodes.name: Ball of Fame
episodes.overview: When Tom and Jerry's antics unearth an autographed baseball, he warns Tom to keep his paws off it! Tom attempts to obey, but Jerry's got other ideas. The guys chase the treasured ball all over the neighborhood.

episodes.name: My Buddy Guard
episodes.overview: A robot turns from friend to foe forcing Tom, Jerry, Spike and Tuffy to team up in order to rid themselves of the invader.

episodes.name: Hangin' Tough
episodes.overview: Tom battles Butch to prove to Toodles that he's the better gentlemen. While they battle it out, Jerry calls in Cousin Muscles who demonstrate how a true gentleman really behaves.

episodes.name: Shadow of a Doubt
episodes.overview: The detectives are desperately trying to help George and Junior find a missing black panther from the city zoo.

episodes.name: It's the Little Things
episodes.overview: When Tom drinks a potion given to him by a Gypsy woman and shrinks to the size of an insect, he must beg Jerry Van Mouseling for help in finding a cure.

episodes.name: Always Say Never Again
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry are hired by a British super spy to help guard the Queen's precious objects while they are on display in the city.

episodes.name: Into the Woods
episodes.overview: When an accident leaves Jerry wrapped head to toe in bandages and unable to take his scout troop camping, a guilt-ridden Tom decides to lead the kids into the woods himself.

episodes.name: Mice Fair Ladies
episodes.overview: Jerry's cousins pay a return visit to the Manor eager to create mayhem for Tom, things get crazier than ever when the cousins wives show up as well.

episodes.name: Hot Wings
episodes.overview: A lemur belonging to the Duchess' adventurous cousin puts Tom's job as Under-Butler in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Wild Goose Chase
episodes.overview: The detectives agree to escort a goofy Canadian goose back across the border before duck hunting season begins.

episodes.name: Play Date with Destiny
episodes.overview: A wild chase leads Jerry into the arms of a little girl and now Tom has to help Jerry escape her clutches.

episodes.name: Mind Your Royal Manners
episodes.overview: Fearful that he will lose his place in the Manor, Tom adopts the attitude of a member of the Royal Guard in order to keep the mice and their new friend, Boswell, from wreaking havoc in the kitchen.

episodes.name: A Rare Breed
episodes.overview: Jerry is mistaken for a rare breed of Guinea Pig by the Duchess' professor friend and uses his protected, elevated status to create endless problems for Tom.

episodes.name: Oh, Brother
episodes.overview: Spike's big brother, Max, shows up on the run from some bad guys and Spike must enlist the help of Tuffy, Tom and Jerry to get rid of him.

episodes.name: Who Sled the Dogs Out?
episodes.overview: The detectives help a team of Huskies find the villain who is determined to sabotage their dog sled race.

episodes.name: Tick, Tick, Tick
episodes.overview: Jerry uses a friendly tick to get even with Tom.

episodes.name: The Butterfly Effect
episodes.overview: Tuffy and Jerry, pretending to be butterflies, prank Tom and cause all sorts of trouble in the house until the Duke catches Tuffy with the intention of adding him to his butterfly collection.

episodes.name: Curiosity Thrilled The Cat
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry become obsessed with the contents of a wrapped package and go to extraordinary measure to find out what's inside without being caught by Rick and Ginger.

episodes.name: The Wearing of the Green
episodes.overview: Jerry helps a Leprechaun retrieve the pot of gold that he's lost to Tom.

episodes.name: Ball of Fire
episodes.overview: The hot dog relish that Crooked Eddie brings to the detectives turns out to be an explosive device that Tom and Jerry must now return to the lab before it inadvertently blows up the entire city.

episodes.name: The Masked Mouse
episodes.overview: Tuffy surprises Jerry with a visit from the actor who plays his favorite TV show character, "The Masked Mouse". Turns out, the actor is a prima donna who makes everyone's life miserable.

episodes.name: Flower Power
episodes.overview: A bouquet of flowers causes Tom no end of trouble.

episodes.name: Polar Excess
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry have to contend with a baby polar bear that has been mistakenly delivered to Rick and Ginger's house.

episodes.name: Un-Easy Chair
episodes.overview: Tom must enlist the neighborhood cats to help him remove the cat hairs from Rick's new massage chair.

episodes.name: Something to Crow About
episodes.overview: A scarecrow terrorizes Catsylvania.

episodes.name: Hush Puppy
episodes.overview: Ginger is asked by her mother to watch her dog, Goliath, while she is away. Goliath is a gentle giant, unless you wake him from his nap!

episodes.name: Dog Star Spike
episodes.overview: The Mice from Mars make a return visit and set about making mischief between Spike and Tom.

episodes.name: Donut Daze
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry get locked inside a travel trunk and end up on a vacation cruise to France.

episodes.name: Tom's Cruise
episodes.overview: Tom uses a new fangled scientific machine to make copies off himself creating a living nightmare for Jerry.

episodes.name: Ten Toms the Trouble
episodes.overview: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchess' surprise birthday party for nephew Rupert and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

episodes.name: Turkey Tom
episodes.overview: Tom and Jerry work together to save a live turkey from becoming the centerpiece of a holiday feast.

episodes.name: Tom Save the Queen
episodes.overview: The detectives across the hall are responsible for a series of high profile thefts and are framing innocent people for the crimes.

episodes.name: Party Animals
episodes.overview: It's a battle royale over the last box of donuts.

episodes.name: Tap Cat
episodes.overview: An old pair of Ginger's tap shoes turns Tom into a tap dancing fanatic.

episodes.name: The Ol' Switcheroo
episodes.overview: Tuffy's wish to be as strong as Spike comes true.

episodes.name: How to Be a Dog
episodes.overview: Spike demonstrates for Tuffy what it takes to be a dog.

episodes.name: See Ya Gator
episodes.overview: Jerry befriends a lost baby gator, keeping it safe from harm until it's momma arrives to take it back home.

episodes.name: All That Glitters
episodes.overview: The cat and mouse detectives pose as bellhops at a swanky hotel to catch a jewel thief.

episodes.name: Junkyard Pup
episodes.overview: When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump, Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before Ace and Rocco, the junkyards guard dogs, turn him into a formidable junkyard pup.

episodes.name: The French Mistake
episodes.overview: Tom is placed in charge of caring for the Duchess' French Poodle and needs Tuffy and Jerry's help in keeping the ill-tempered mutt under control.

episodes.name: A Kick in the Tail
episodes.overview: When Tuffy shows an interest in soccer, Jerry decides to be the little guys coach and show him how the game is really played by beating Tom in a one-on-one match.

episodes.name: Broom for Improvement
episodes.overview: The gang do battle with a magical broom.

episodes.name: Puppy Guard
episodes.overview: An over protected Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

episodes.name: Bones of Contention
episodes.overview: Spikes bones are missing and Frankie the Rat is the culprit. Now all they have to do is catch in the dirty rat in the act.

episodes.name: Farmed and Dangerous
episodes.overview: Things get crazy down on the farm when a cat and mouse pursuit leads Jerry to hide his turtle egg in a hen's nest.

episodes.name: Slam Dunk
episodes.overview: The Cat and Mouse are hired to find out who absconded with Hoops McJumpalot's lucky high top sneakers.

episodes.name: Attachment Disorder
episodes.overview: Tom and Spike get glued together.
